alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:48AM EST until December 28 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Litchfield County in Northwestern Connecticut, The Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Greater Capital Region including the Helderbergs, Eastern Catskills, Mid Hudson Valley, and the Taconics of eastern New York and the Berkshires of western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are expected due to a light accretion of ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
